articles.description: A 26-year-old Bengaluru-based techie collapsed during a triathlon endurance race on Sunday. He died on Monday.
articles.content: A 26-year-old Bengaluru-based techie collapsed during a triathlon endurance race on Sunday. He died a day later in hospital. Kamakhya Siddharth Shrivastava was taking part in Ironman 70.3 in Goa on S… [+1443 chars]

articles.title: CWC 2023: Former Indian opener Gautam Gambhir makes blunt remarks on personal milestones over team's victory - Cricket Times
articles.description: KL Rahul missed his century by three runs in India's World Cup clash against Australia. Former cricketer Gautam Gambhir shared his perspective on the personal achievement versus Team's success debate.
articles.content:
In the fifth match of the ICC Cricket World Cup 2023 in Chennai, India showcased their dominance with a resounding six-wicket victory over Australia.

articles.title: Oliveira out, Volkanovski in to face Makhachev at UFC 294 - ESPN - ESPN India
articles.description: Alexander Volkanovski will replace an injured Charles Oliveira and fight lightweight champ Islam Makhachev in the main event of UFC 294 on Oct. 21.
articles.content:
The UFC's next pay-per-view main event fell apart Tuesday, only for the promotion to put together arguably an even bigger one.
